title: Winter at Mount Buffalo
brief_description: Holiday at Mount Buffalo, a skier’s paradise. Novices are taught how to ski and how not to ski. Demonstrations of herring bone and side stepping up steep slopes, balance and control for slalom beginners; the thrill of a snow-jump and an exhilarating 60 miles per hour run by experts.
